Join this deal and take all the benefits of our high performance dedicated servers starting at only €22,75/month

Premium network and hardware, lifetime pricing, no setup fees, no contract!


*Servers are delivered almost always same day
*Heavily peered network
*Best transit connections
*Month to month contracts
*Secure Environment
*Fully Managed Available
*24/7 Support

All our servers can be upgraded with more RAM, HARDDISKS (also SSD), traffic.
100 Mbps unmetered and 1 Gbps unmetered are available.
